problem.p: A system consists of two blocks, of masses m and 2m, attached to the ends of a massless spring with a force constant k. The system is placed on a horizontal frictionless surface. Initially, the spring is relaxed. The blocks are then pulled apart an “extra” distance x and released from the state of rest.
When the spring is relaxed again, what statement about their instantaneous speeds is correct?

choicegroup.choice: Block m has a greater speed
Both blocks have equal non-zero speed
